name: Dyadic - Alpha Prototype
description:
Dyadic is a 2D co-op puzzle platformer, designed around the themes of trust and sharing. Players are required to work together to solve puzzles in an ancient ruin and work their way towards the exit by trading various items back and forth between them. The alpha prototype was developed in six weeks by 8 people.

Dyadic is currently being developed further by Handsome Dragon Games, and is scheduled for a Greenlight debut in late July.
